{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Wle1200v2-22 r.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = 2.4GHz 4Ã—4 802.11n Module |caption2 = |pp = http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wle1200v2-22/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Compex_WLE1200V2-22 |wikipedia = |brand = Compex |model = WLE1200V |submodelappend = |submodel = 2-22 |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 20, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compex_WLE1200V2-22 |sernum = |wlclass = N600 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Mini PCIe |formfactor = (oversized) |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0040 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 4 |rxchains = 4 |sstreams = 4 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam = |802.11n = 600 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.412~2.472 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = sampling |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 05/2015 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ''Get the latest Updates from Compex Systems - [http://eepurl.com/bXB9j5 Link]'' ===Product highlights=== * [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 * QCA Reference Design CUS260 * 2.4GHz max 22dBm output power (per chain) * 4X4 MIMO Technology & up to 600Mbps * Multi-User MIMO (MU-MIMO) beamformer * Mini PCI Express 2.0 interface * 802.11n compliant and backward compatible with 802.11b/g * Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Low-density parity check (LDPC), Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), Space Time Block Code (STBC), Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC) * Supports 802.11d/e/h, I/k, RO/v time stamp, and w standards * Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) * Cards are individually calibrated for quality assurance ===Specifications=== *The WLE1200V2-22 is a 802.11b/g/n wireless adapter that operates in both the 2.4 GHz bands, available in PCIe mini card form factor. *Featuring AR9980 chipset (CUS260 reference design), the WLE1200V2-22 increases the overall throughput up to 600Mbps with 4x4 MIMO. *WLE1200V2-22 sets a new benchmark in throughput and range, making it ideal for consumer and enterprise applications. *The WLE1200V2-22 is backward compatible with 802.11b/g and fully supports industry standards compliant security. ==Links of Interest== ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/wle1200v2-22.html Compex System Sample Store] === Ordering Configuration === 
Item Code 	 	Chipset  Card FF     Information
WLE1200V2-CUS260-8A-TE  QCA9980    4x4      2.4GHz mini PCIe
